movies.title: Spectre
movies.originalTitle: Películas para no dormir: Regreso a Moira
movies.plot: An elderly writer visits the small village where he grew up and as he walks through he catches a glimpse of the same woman he fell in love with in his youth but she has not aged at all! He follows her, but is not ready for what he finds
movies.simplePlot: An elderly writer visits the small village where he grew up and as he walks through he catches a glimpse of the same woman he fell in love with in his youth but she has not aged at all! He follows her, but is not ready for what he finds

biography.bio: Juan José Ballesta was only nine when he debuted in the TV series Querido maestro (1997) but his real break came when director Achero Mañas gave him the title role in his sensitive Truffaut-like tale of two youths El Bola (2000). The film garnered lots of awards, of which young Juan José got a fairly impressive share,namely the 2001 Best Actor Award given by the Cinema Writers Circle of Spain, the 2001 Best New Actor Goya and 2001 the Newcomer Award by the Spanish Actors Union. Now aged twenty-three, Juan José is still present on the Spanish screens and is on the way for a long career.
biography.name: Juan José Ballesta

biography.bio: Natalia Millán was born on November 27, 1969 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain. She is an actress, known for The Boarding School (2007), Love in Difficult Times (2005) and Nubes de verano (2004).
biography.name: Natalia Millán

biography.bio: Jordi Dauder was born on March 5, 1938 in Badalona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. He was an actor, known for The Nameless (1999), Camino (2008) and The Weakness of the Bolshevik (2003). He died on September 15, 2011 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Jordi Dauder

biography.bio: Victoria Mora was born in 1959 in Almería, Andalucía, Spain. She is an actress and casting director, known for Carlos Against the World (2002), Spectre (2006) and El día que decidí matarme (2011).
biography.name: Victoria Mora

biography.bio: David Arnaiz was born on August 11, 1973 in Seville, Andalucía, Spain. He is an actor, known for Yo soy Bea (2006), Spectre (2006) and Lola, la película (2007).
biography.name: David Arnaiz

biography.bio: Adrián Marín is an actor and producer, known for Plans for Tomorrow (2010), La solitude (2007) and Sin palabras (2010).
biography.name: Adrián Marín

biography.bio: José Ángel Egido was born in 1951 in Redondela, Pontevedra, Galicia, Spain. He is known for his work on Les lundis au soleil (2002), Águila Roja (2009) and Open Your Eyes (1997).
biography.name: José Ángel Egido

biography.bio: Miguel Rellán was born on November 7, 1943 in Tetuan, Morocco as Miguel Ángel Rellán García. He is an actor, known for Revolución (2002), Menudo es mi padre (1996) and Compañeros (1998).
biography.name: Miguel Rellán

biography.bio: Mayte Cedeño is an actress and cinematographer, known for Spectre (2006), Quantum Men (2011) and El árbol (2009).
biography.name: Mayte Cedeño

biography.bio: Joserra Cadiñanos is an actor, known for Open Your Eyes (1997), Talk to Her (2002) and Thesis (1996).
biography.name: Joserra Cadiñanos

biography.bio: Walter Prieto is an assistant director and actor, known for The Sea Inside (2004), Thesis (1996) and Butterfly (1999).
biography.name: Walter Prieto

biography.bio: Elisa Medina is an actress, known for Spectre (2006) and Policías, en el corazón de la calle (2000).
biography.name: Elisa Medina

biography.bio: Helena Castañeda is an actress, known for Football Days (2003), El Calentito (2005) and The Wedding (2012).
biography.name: Helena Castañeda

biography.bio: Elsa Bodem is an actress, known for Spectre (2006).
biography.name: Elsa Bodem

biography.bio: Juan Aballe is an actor, known for Spectre (2006).
biography.name: Juan Aballe
